description: Looking for a cocktail recipe that is new and delicious? We have the perfect one! This&nbsp;Cranberry Margarita cocktail will be your next&nbsp;party favorite. You can serve it at any get together with friends or bring it to the office on Friday to help keep boredom away during those long hours of workdays.
name: Cranberry Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Combine and stir all ingredients together until blended.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine and stir all ingredients together until blended.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve over ice in sugar- or salt-rimmed glasses.
recipeInstructions.text: Serve over ice in sugar- or salt-rimmed glasses.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with fresh cranberries and lime wedges if desired.
recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with fresh cranberries and lime wedges if desired.
